title: The Deep State Drops Another Fake “Bombshell” (Ep 1846)
description:
In this episode, I address the latest “bombshell” media/deep-state hit on Trump. 

News Picks:


The Washington Post is really trying to push the nuclear secrets hoax. 


Peter Doocy wrecks Karine Jean Pierre on “stolen elections.”

Joe's on the Come

back Trail' Narrative Takes Serious Hit in Key New Polling Numbers.


Price controls fail AGAIN.
